Address.label: Address
Address.value: C/O CORPORATE TRUSTEE SIMMONS BANK,2911 TURTLE CREEK BOULEVARD, SUITE 850, DALLAS, Texas, 75219, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Cross Timbers Royalty Trust is a United States based trust. Its principal asset is the net profits interests. The net profits interests are derived from producing royalty, overriding royalty interests, and working interests properties. The underlying properties of the trust include producing properties in Texas, Oklahoma, and New Mexico.
